text:
Today's TIP FAQs and Facts:
Can the #COVID19 #vaccine give me #Covid_19?
No, because #mRNA #vaccines do not use the live virus that causes COVID-19. And, by the way, your #flushot does not give you the #flu. #immunizeUSA #immunizeTX #VaxTexas #VaccinesWork #VaccinesSaveLives https://t.co/GBechCp3PP
